73c35918-2ac0-45be-ad7d-9a25ae7438ee:
A missile of magical energy darts forth from your fingertip and strikes its target, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g}+1 points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}force damage{/g}.
The missile strikes unerringly, even if the target is in melee combat, so long as it has less than total cover or total {g|Encyclopedia:Concealment}concealment{/g}.
For every two {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g} beyond 1st, you gain an additional missile â€“ two at 3rd level, three at 5th, four at 7th, and the maximum of five missiles at 9th level or higher.
b2315457-602d-4227-8cda-62c33b6dc857:
The target's bones (or exoskeleton) splinter, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} (maximum 15d6) to the target, which is also {g|ConditionExhausted}exhausted{/g} for 1 minute per caster level from the pain and exertion of the transformation.
If the target succeeds at its {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g}, it takes half damage and is {g|ConditionFatigued}fatigued{/g} rather than exhausted.
